location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to James Farish, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter concerns a request from the Bombay Government that the Resident procure some sheep from Cashmere [Kashmir]. It notes the difficulties presented by procuring sheep via this route, suggests an application to Delhi as an alternative and mentions the long haired shaggy goat, which is available locally to Bushire.
